section.name: Info Element
section.p: The <info> element declares the resource group, name, optional version, and resource types.

tr.td: Declaration of the project group. <group>dpml/test</group> If the enclosing index declares a defining module then the module group will be used as the default group. If no module key is declared the group element must be included.

Declaration of the resource version. If undeclared, the default value is SNAPSHOT unless the system property ${dpml.release.signature} is declared in which case the value of ${dpml.release.signature} will be assigned as the project version. <version>1.1</version>

Declaration of the resource types produced by the project. <types> <type name="jar"/> <type name="plugin" alias=""/> </types> The <type> element declares the resource type under the 'name' attribute and may optionally declare an alias attribute. If the value of the alias attribute is "" a link without version will be created for the resource. If the value of the alias attribute is not "" the value will be used as the link version.
